mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( M_NO, M_EMAIL, M_PWD, M_NAME ) VALUES ( 31, #{mEmail}, #{mPwd}, #{mName} )
mapper.select: SELECT M_NAME, M_PHONE, M_BIRTH, M_GENDER, MG_STORAGE, C_TYPE, PT_STORAGE FROM MEMBER MEM, MILEAGE MG, COUPON CP, POINT PT WHERE MEM.M_NO = MG.M_NO(+) AND MEM.M_NO = CP.M_NO(+) AND MEM.M_NO = PT.M_NO(+) AND MEM.M_NO = #{mNo}
